definition: many and varied/of many different kinds
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
names of many kinds (idiom); items of every description

sentences.english: Our products are unique in style and various in color.
sentences.chinese: 公司产品风格独具，独树一帜，花色品种繁多。

sentences.english: Different types of jade differ in color.
sentences.chinese: 玉质的品种繁多，颜色各异。

sentences.english: Jixiang products not only have excellent quality, but also have variety of patterns.
sentences.chinese: 吉祥的产品不仅品质优良，而且花样繁多。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhong Shuliang s prose creation is characterized with rich achievements in large quantities.
sentences.chinese: 钟树梁先生散文创作数量繁多，成果丰硕。

sentences.english: There are so much variety that you never have to do with the second best.
sentences.chinese: 物品品种繁多，从来不必用二等品来凑合。

sentences.english: The shop offers a large choice of hats and shoes.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店的鞋帽样式繁多，可供选择的余地很大。

sentences.english: What is it about the tropics that so fosters biodiversity?
sentences.chinese: 是什么让热带地区的生物物种这么繁多呢？

sentences.english: The fishermen's song in Huidong enjoys a long history and a great variety.
sentences.chinese: 惠东渔歌历史悠久，品种繁多。

sentences.english: There are various nickeliferous minerals in the Cu-Ni mineralization zone of Huangshan.
sentences.chinese: 黄山铜镍成矿带中含镍矿物种类繁多，成分复杂。

sentences.english: CCC has various kinds of products, which makes it convenient to do purchasing.
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷城的产品种类繁多，大大地方便了我的采购。

sentences.english: The organization had many obligations among which cooperation and mutual help were its aims.
sentences.chinese: 里父老的职责繁多，协作互助是父老僤的宗旨。

sentences.english: Today, there are various cheating methods and advanced cheating skills.
sentences.chinese: 如今，作弊方式花样繁多，作弊技术也日趋先进。

sentences.english: The names of items are too numerous to enumerate.
And the angel of the LORD said unto her, I will multiply thy seed exceedingly, that it shall not be numbered for multitude.
sentences.chinese: 又说，我必使你的后裔极其繁多，甚至不可胜数。

sentences.english: Tianjin boasts the large variety of kites.
sentences.chinese: 天津是风筝的种类繁多。

sentences.english: Because the product quantity is many, cannot record, welcome to inquire .
sentences.chinese: 因产品数量繁多，不能尽录，欢迎查询。

definition: names of many kinds (idiom); items of every description
as many as the hair of the ox (idiom)/great amount of/countless
many and complicated/mired in minor details
